comment.author: 52325611@N05
comment._content: See Draeger Pulmotor | Wood Library-Museum for a brief description and photographs of a Pulmotor. There is an article about the Pulmotor at Pulmotor – Wikipedia albeit it's in German, the English-language Wikipedia having no article specific to the Pulmotor. A 1920-model Pulmotor can be seen at Dräger Pulmotor von 1920 (Automatic oxygen resuscitation machine) - YouTube.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
